name: Hello Counsel
storyline:
Josephine, better known as the sensational criminal thrillseeker Poise, just got arrested! Good thing, her hot lawyer boyfriend Salem is here to help her avoid any jail time — only if she stops flirting with him, that is.

Right to counsel involves counseling from both parties, right?
summary: Hello Counsel is a short, romantic comedy visual novel that follows criminal sensation, Poise, who just got arrested! Good thing, her hot lawyer boyfriend Salem is here to help her avoid any jail time — only if she stops flirting with him, that is.
